long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block as many websites as you want permanently, on a schedule, in incognito browsers, or on a whitelist. 

Create a focus group to block all websites EXCEPT the ones in the focus group list. 

If you're worried about me stealing your data, don't be. All this code is for free and you can see it here: https://github.com/aadilmallick/new-webblock

Future features
- Preventing user from unblocking websites by making them answer a bunch of math questions first. 
- When user tries to uninstall extension, guilt trip users by opening a page that absolutely roasts them.
- Have a custom page or quote users can redirect to.


Patch Notes
- v1.0.1: made the app actually work
- v1.0.2: fixed weird flexbox issue with add block site schedule UI
- v1.0.4: add focus groups
- v1.0.5: show schedule timing and add url options
- v1.0.6: add option to block certain sites only in incognito windows
- v1.0.8: fix permanent block bug
